abstrac: We help customers launch brands, build connections, craft websites and deliver digital success using experience and technology.
bio:
We are not only a design or development company but a one stop solution provider for all your business needs. We established in the year 2014 and since then we are dedicated to provide digital solutions covering graphics, web, mobile & more…

We started with a very small team of enthusiastic professionals and grew each passing year with more strength and skilled workforce. Our team is our success!!!

Our core strength is to provide any business with a rock-solid solution to empower them with cutting edge technology whether it is related to design or development. With our experience, we understand various industries and have worked with many sectors. We have deep knowledge of these sectors and know exactly what they need in terms of their online growth.

What makes us different from others - Why us ?

1. Team of Experienced & Enthusiastic Artists, Designers & Developers

2. More than 16+ years of vast experience in deploying simple to complex projects with ease.

3. Experience and solutions in hand related to real world project challenges which makes it easier to deploy any kind of project without any haste.

4. World class support with 100% successful solutions which makes us very reliable and determined.

5. We have a very specific process of analyzing and executing a project providing a strong foundation for the success of any project.

6. Our project budgeting is one of the most important factors which makes us stand out from the crowd.

We expertise in following Services -

1. Web Design & Development
2. Graphic & Print Design
3. Digital Marketing
4. Illustrations & Animations
5. Mobile App Development
6. Game Development
7. Video Production
8. Photo Editing

Trusted by the world’s best organizations, for 16+ years and running, it has been delivering smiles to hundreds of IT employees, developers, users, and business owners!

To make the procedure easier we have kept our work terms straight forward and simpler.

1. Free Project Consultancy - Before finalizing any project, we assist you with your project scope and discuss every details. We provide you 100% free consultancy which let you decide how to proceed your project with us.

2. Drafting Scope of Work (SOW) - As soon as we discuss the project, we draft all the outlines in a Scope of work document which helps us to keep track of all the details during project development.

3. Providing Estimate - Once SOW is approved, we will send detailed project estimate.

4. Payment Milestones - We usually have 2 milestones for low and mid budget projects and 4 milestones for large budget projects. All the payment milestones are usually divided into equal parts. For some special projects we always remain flexible with payment terms.

5. Escrow - We support guru.com Escrow service for any payments. All milestones will be loaded into escrow account which will be released by client further after completion of that milestone.

Apart from the above process for any project completion, our tea remain available most of the time to discuss on your project, queries and any other project related discussion.

We are most of the time available on our email, official skype ID and if needed on telephonic communication.

Still have questions? Get in touch now - https://interactiveideaz.com/#quote

commnet: This section of the task has been checked and has been completed

bio:
I have a plenty of experience in various website and blockchain dApp development. I prefer to stay up to date with the whole development process from database structure and server infrastructure to mobile responsive views and analytics. Moreover, I dive deep into company business processes and I won't hesitate to suggest any ideas aimed to improve it from the development side.

I use Node.js, Laravel and Django for all issues related to API creation thankful to its flexibility and robust structure. Task scheduling-related problems I solve with Celery and Redis as a message broker. I stick to the standard React.js stack with Redux, Redux-Saga, Redux-Thunk, and forms processing with either Redux Form or Formik. I am excited to find a way to integrate with third-party services going beyond provided API, often using great Python tools such as Scrapy, Beautiful Soup, and pure Regular Expressions.

I can handle the usual weekly load of 40~60 hours splitting it into 8~10 hours a day including weekends and I am almost online to provide urgent solutions when needed.

Thank you for your consideration!

abstrac: Professionalism, accuracy and quality,services and work collections
bio:
Hi, I am a 34 years mother of one. I've lived in a lot exciting countries all my life, and gained so much by being in contact with all these cultures. Born a French speaker, i moved with my family to the UK, when i was just 7 years old. I was enrolled at a French school, In Aberdeen Scotland. Several years later,We moved to the Netherlands, still following a French educational program. My tertiary education was fully earned in South Africa , where I've opted for management studies, e commerce and Marketing and merchandising.
 my work experience ranges from a Travelling agency to a London based drilling company, In Gabon Africa. I've elaborated bills for customers, and was responsible for retrieving payments from clients.clients. I've worked as a purchasing officer for a drilling company "Core Mining" for about a year. My translating experience was gained from translating documents for foreign based companies in Gabon.

I usually work a minimum of 7 to 10 hours a day, depending on the workload. Payments are made through the Guru escrow system. I usually give feedback to my clients while on the job. I communicate by e-mail or Skype.

abstrac: NetConnect Digital is a Pennsylvania based, pioneering web design and e-Commerce development company that can take your online business and profits to the next level.
bio:
NetConnect Digital is a leading Website Design and Development Company that is committed to provide its customers with creativity, originality and well-researched expertise in the website design and development field.  We strive hard to achieve excellence in innovation, delivery and service. We are a company that keeps the needs of clients at the forefront of its business. Facilitating our clients with stellar customer experience remains our top most priority from the time the Company was incepted.

NetConnect Web is a Company that understands that every enterprise is unique and so are their web development needs. We also realize that a website has the potential to make or break your business and hence leave no stone unturned to ensure that your website is aesthetically appealing to your client base, is functional and easy to navigate. In simpler terms, we design and develop websites that facilitate your customers to connect instantly with your products, services and business.

NetConnect Web believes in keeping itself updated with the latest changes and developments in the field of website design and development, and as part of this endeavor, conducts regular apprising and updating programs for its clients. This is to ensure that the clients receive the best in class, each and every time they rely on us for a project.

Our team is detail-oriented, leaving no room for errors or miscommunications. It is our constant endeavor to create and develop long lasting business relationships with our clients, and we work closely with our clients’ team to understand their business objectives and needs, so that we can design and develop websites or applications that best suit their business goals.
We work 8am-5pm Eastern US Time - You can contact us by phone or Skype

abstrac: TURN YOUR VISION INTO DAZZLING MEDIA REALITIES
bio: I founded New Galaxy Enterprises as a media company for the purpose of assisting individuals and businesses in developing and promoting original media content to perfect their personal or corporate vision. My goal is to translate your media dream, large or small, into a tangible, marketable reality, utilizing over thirty years of writing for media. I am a widely experienced freelance writer, journalist and screenwriter, specializing in in creative writing projects, press releases and resumes. I offer the clients the ability to create a full length screenplay and/or book, within approximately 3 months.

Thank you for looking at my profile. To make things easier on both of us. I expect clear direction and communications from my prospective clients from the very outset- so that I can accomplish the work with the kind of stress-free excitement and enthusiasm it deserves. I take any kind of project that has clarity and integrity, big or small, time permitting- that I feel is in the scope of my interest and skills.

bio:
I am a creative writer with a burning passion for crafting words into beautiful and captivating pieces. I take every work of writing as my very last and thus, I create the best every time I put pen on paper or my fingers on the keyboard. I have years of experience in writing and proofreading. I have had only positive reviews from all my clients in the past.

I recently joined this platform to further explore other areas which would help nourish my steadily growing writing career. A picture might be worth a thousand words, but a thousand words of mine will be enough to elicit the deepest emotions in you.
 
So come along, let’s create the most captivating pieces ever seen in the history of writing. I look earnestly to working with you. 

Feel free to send me a message.

Diepreye Victoria

I am available to work anytime.

I also offer very flexible working terms depending on how and when you want your work done.
